scripts.android: cd android && chmod -R 777 ./gradlew && cd ../ && react-native run-android
scripts.prebuild: export ENVFILE=.env.dev && npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.build: export ENVFILE=.env.dev && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug && cd ../
scripts.dev-android-release: export ENVFILE=.env.dev && cd android && ./gradlew clean && ./gradlew assembleDevRelease
scripts.dev-android-release-windows: set ENVFILE=.env.dev && npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/dev/res && cd android && gradlew assembleDevDebug && cd ..
scripts.dev-android-build: export ENVFILE=.env.dev && npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/dev/res && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDevDebug && cd ../
scripts.staging-android-release: export ENVFILE=.env.staging && cd android && ./gradlew clean && ./gradlew assembleStagingRelease
scripts.staging-android-build: export ENVFILE=.env.staging && npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/staging/res && cd android && ./gradlew assembleStagingDebug && cd ../
scripts.staging-android-build-windows: set ENVFILE=.env.staging && npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/staging/res && cd android && gradlew assembleStagingDebug && cd ..
